item.title: Hundreds of families displaced by wave of Israeli air strikes on Gaza, witnesses say
item.description: At least five people were reported killed in the overnight attacks, as fears of an intensified ground offensive grow.

item.title: Prada acknowledges footwear design's Indian roots after backlash
item.description: Prada described the Kolhapuri sandals as "leather footwear" but did not mention its origins, prompting backlash.

item.title: Two firefighters shot dead in Idaho ambush, police say
item.description: The suspect has been found dead after the firefighters were killed with a high-powered weapon, authorities say.

item.title: I lost half my weight in jail, but I'm not broken, says freed Belarus opposition leader
item.description: Sergei Tikhanovsky was kept isolated in bare, tiny cells and tells the BBC that Belarus must free other political prisoners.

item.title: Watch: Humanoid robots stumble through football match in China
item.description: The robots kicked, scored and tumbled while competing at a tourmentant in Beijing.
